EmailTemplate.name: 2016Q3.Global.NUR.1997.Cloud wise.Email 3 - Cloud wise services overview ebook
EmailTemplate.subject: Learn to read the clouds – Download our eBook today
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Nokia eBook: cloud wise services Telco cloud services
Cloud wise services – Your cloud transformation partner Nokia cloud wise services can support your every cloud need, easing the transition to a cloud architecture tailor-made for your objectives. Download the eBook <[[https://pages.nokia.com/1993.Cloud.wise.services.ebook.html]]> ► Every journey to the cloud is different. Where should you start yours?
With Nokia cloud wise services.
Our extensive experience, deep expertise and ecosystem of partners mean Nokia can help you find your own way to the cloud. Learn how Nokia cloud wise services give you:
- A transformation path customized according to your strategy - A tailored suite of multivendor services - Fast deployment and validation of cloud services - A single point of contact and faster time-to-value - Expertise in IT and telco (fixed + mobile) - A varied choice of operational models © 2016 Nokia. Contact Us <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/contact]]> | Terms of Use <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/terms]]> | Privacy Policy <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/privacy]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
